text: Rodolphe Scherer (born 11 April 1972) is a French equestrian. He competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:French male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of France Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Nantes
title: Rodolphe Scherer
